pages.title: Applico
pages.content: Applico is a website that uses a column based organizational approach to let users easily create and manage their job applications

pages.title: Straightforward Tracking
pages.content: Easily track the status of your applications uing the different columns on the dashboard

pages.title: Editing
pages.content: Easily edit each application to update its relevant information, status, and notes

pages.title: Keeping track of tasks
pages.content: Manage your day-to-day tasks using the to-do tab

pages.title: Calendar
pages.content: See what's coming up in the calendar tab

footer.blurb: Applico is currently in closed beta, but check back soon for more information!
